price: それで、その（善行の）秤が重かった者、それらの者たちこそは成功者。
arabic: فَمَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: faman thaqulat mawāzīnuhu fa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
